# Screenshots Directory

This directory contains screenshots for the main README.

## Required Files

- `hero-image.png` - Main hero image at top of README
- `editor-mode.png` - Split-pane editor view
- `writing-mode.png` - Writing Focus Mode
- `reader-mode.png` - Reader Mode view
- `backup-comparison.png` - Backup comparison window
- `file-tree-sidebar.png` - File tree sidebar navigation
- `outline-sidebar.png` - Outline sidebar showing document structure

See `../.github/SCREENSHOTS-GUIDE.md` for detailed instructions on what to capture.

## Taking Screenshots

1. Run the application
2. Follow the guide in `SCREENSHOTS-GUIDE.md`
3. Save screenshots with exact filenames listed above
4. Commit and push to GitHub

The README already has the image references - once you add the screenshots here, they'll appear automatically.
